## Pre-merge checklist
- [ ] Code works interactively
- [ ] Code contains descriptive comments
- [ ] Test suite passes locally
- [ ] Libraries are set to ``Always Newest`` version (``Library, *``)
- [ ] Committed with ``pre-commit`` or ran ``pre-commit run --all-files``
